name: First Law (TechHead)
description:
Enter a space-based couch-multiplayer arena shooter and end some friendships! Features loads of customization, exclusively local multiplayer because I was too lazy to add online or AI support and had already been working on this for way too long, and a ton of wild and wacky game modifiers, plus a completely original soundtrack of THREE WHOLE TUNES!

Controls are listed in-game - Just hit the Options button to view and change keybinds.
Other than that, the only unlisted keybind is pause - just hit the ENTER key to pause the game at any time! I'd recommend using multiple keyboards to avoid ghosting.
